column4: what is the acceptable temp range (in celcius) for an intel core 2 duo cpu?
does it differ between core 2 duos?
i know it has more cache than the entry level one... i think 4mb
Actually try this: cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep model\ name
If your load temps are under 60 (preferably around 50) you're ok.
my cpu is currently at 68 or 69* C ... what does that mean?  should i get a better fan
Did you build this yourself?  Are you sure those temps are correct?
my comp does random restarts sometimes.......... yes i built it myself. ... i got the temp from the bios (asus mobo)
u dont think i need a new fan?  its a intel cpu fan that came with processor..............   however the fan is getting kinda hard to put back onto the cpu securelty
That's a possibility.  You need perfect contact between the CPU and heatsink.
hmmmmmmmmm so u think a new fan is the way to go?  also, am i in any danger of running at 68 or 69*C?  wont it auto shut off if its too hot
If it's auto rebooting, then you have a problem.
is there anyway of knowing temp from within ubuntu
